scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -c "#e7b885,#53ceff,#a4d4b8"  "npm run dev:firebase" "sleep 2 && npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" --names=firebase,server,client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:emails && npm run link:emails
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.types: npm run --prefix server types && npm run --prefix client types
scripts.coverage: npm run --prefix server coverage && npm run --prefix client coverage -- run
